summary: Completed testing of Telegram Feed Card landing page feature. All backend APIs and frontend components working correctly. The public feed endpoint returns posts without auth, and the new TelegramFeedCard component displays correctly on the landing page with proper navigation.
passed_tests: GET /api/community-v2/feed/public/recent - Returns posts without authentication (200 OK)
Public feed response excludes MongoDB _id field
GET /api/showcase/media-player - Returns media player config (200 OK)
TelegramFeedCard shows 'Community Channel' header with '3 posts' count
TelegramFeedCard shows post rows with text, timestamps (2d), like/comment indicators
TelegramFeedCard 'Open Community Feed' button (data-testid='telegram-open-feed') navigates to /comunidad
Layout order verified: Banner → Cultural Nav → Media Player → Telegram Feed
All 3 cards visible on mobile viewport (412x915)
Telegram Feed Card visible on mobile
critical_code_review_comments: VERIFIED: telegram_feed.py lines 104-111 - Public endpoint /api/community-v2/feed/public/recent correctly excludes _id and caps limit at 10
VERIFIED: TelegramFeedCard.jsx - Component fetches from public endpoint, displays posts with timestamps, like/comment counts
VERIFIED: MosaicCommunityLanding.jsx - TelegramFeedCard added as 3rd section (data-testid='telegram-feed-section'), mosaic grid removed
VERIFIED: All data-testid attributes present for testing: telegram-feed-card, telegram-see-all, telegram-open-feed, telegram-post-{id}

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All UI elements render correctly, navigation works)

test_credentials.note: Public feed endpoint requires no authentication

seed_data_creation: 3 posts exist in database from Telegram bot sync (text posts with likes/comments)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Telegram Feed Card feature fully tested and working. Public endpoint /api/community-v2/feed/public/recent returns posts without auth. TelegramFeedCard component renders on landing page as 3rd card after Banner Carousel and Media Player. Navigation buttons work correctly to /comunidad. Mosaic grid has been removed. All data-testid attributes present for automated testing.
